member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.BinaryRasterRegionData
member.summary: Creates or updates the image region using the specified region data.

remarks.para: To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the property. For more information, refer to .

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.faultcontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.imageprocessing.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub BinaryRasterRegionDataExample() Dim client As EffectsProcessingServiceClient = New EffectsProcessingServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "image1.cmp")
Dim convertOptions As RasterConvertOptions = New RasterConvertOptions()
convertOptions.Source = sourceBinaryData convertOptions.Destination = Nothing convertOptions.Format = RasterImageFormat.Bmp convertOptions.FirstPage = 1 convertOptions.LastPage = 1 convertOptions.BitsPerPixel = 24 convertOptions.QualityFactor = 2
Dim region As Region = New Region(New Rectangle(0, 0, 200, 200))
Dim binaryRasterRegionData As BinaryRasterRegionData = New BinaryRasterRegionData() binaryRasterRegionData.CombineMode = RasterRegionCombineMode.Set binaryRasterRegionData.Data = region.GetRegionData().Data
Dim request As SharpenRequest = New SharpenRequest()
request.ConvertOptions = convertOptions request.RegionData = binaryRasterRegionData request.Sharpness = 1000
Dim response As CommandResponse = client.Sharpen(request) If Not response.Destination Is Nothing Then If TypeOf response.Destination Is RawBinaryData Then File.WriteAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "binaryRasterRegionData.bmp", (TryCast(response.Destination, RawBinaryData)).Data) End If End If
region.Dispose() client.Close() End Sub

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionData
member.summary: Base class for , , , , and BinaryRasterRegionData classes.
member.remarks: This class is responsible for applying any Image processing operation to a specified region.

member.summary: Gets or sets the action to be taken regarding the existing image region, if one is defined.
member.value: The to be used if a region currently exists.

remarks.para: To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the CombineMode property. For more information, refer to .

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions
member.summary: The RasterConvertOptions structure provides options for the IRasterService.Convert" operation.

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub RasterConvertOptionsExample() Dim client As RasterServiceClient = New RasterServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "image1.cmp")
Dim convertOptions As RasterConvertOptions = New RasterConvertOptions()
convertOptions.Source = sourceBinaryData convertOptions.Destination = Nothing convertOptions.Format = RasterImageFormat.RasPdf convertOptions.FirstPage = 1 convertOptions.LastPage = 1 convertOptions.BitsPerPixel = 24 convertOptions.QualityFactor = 2 convertOptions.BackColor = "Black" convertOptions.Height = 200 convertOptions.Width = 200 convertOptions.ResizeFlags = RasterResizeFlags.Bicubic convertOptions.ResizeMode = RasterResizeMode.Fit convertOptions.HorizontalAlignMode = RasterAlignMode.Center convertOptions.VerticalAlignMode = RasterAlignMode.Center
Dim request As ConvertRequest = New ConvertRequest()
request.ConvertOptions = convertOptions
Dim response As ConvertResponse = client.Convert(request) If Not response.Destination Is Nothing Then If TypeOf response.Destination Is RawBinaryData Then File.WriteAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "converted_resized.pdf", (TryCast(response.Destination, RawBinaryData)).Data) End If End If
client.Close() End Sub

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.Default
member.summary: Gets the default conversion options used by LEADTOOLS for converting an image.
member.value: The default conversion options used by LEADTOOLS for converting an image.

remarks.para: This property returns a structure that contains the default conversion options to be used to convert an image.
For more information, refer to the structure members.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the input data containing the image.
member.value: A object that represents the image data to be converted.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.Destination
member.summary: Gets or sets the output data of the converted image file.
member.value: A object that represents the converted data.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the format to be used when converting the raster image.
member.value: The format to be used when converting the raster image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates which bits per pixel to be used.
member.value: The bits per pixel. For valid values, refer to Summary of All Supported Image File Formats.
member.remarks: This is the value that should be passed for the bitsPerPixel parameter when calling the method.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.QualityFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the QualityFactor to be used when converting the file.
member.value: The QualityFactor to be used in converting the file, refer to .

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the new image width in pixels.
member.value: New image width in pixels.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.Height
member.summary: Gets or sets the new image height in pixels.
member.value: New image height in pixels.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.ResizeFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the flags that control the behavior when resizing the image.
member.value: Flags that control the behavior when resizing the image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.ResizeMode
member.summary: Determines how to align the resized image in the destination rectangle using the and properties.
member.value: A enumeration value that determines how to align the resized image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.HorizontalAlignMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines how to center the image horizontally when the width of the image is smaller than the property.
member.value: A enumeration value that determines how to to center the image horizontally.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.VerticalAlignMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines how to center the image vertically when the height of the image is smaller than the property.
member.value: A enumeration value that determines how to to center the image vertically.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a color value that determines how to fill the background color if the image dimensions are smaller than the and properties.
member.value: A color value: either a named color value or a hexadecimal color code.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.FirstPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the first page to load. This is 1-based index.
member.value: An integer value that specifies the first page to be loaded.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterConvertOptions.LastPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the last page to load. This is 1-based index. Must be greater than or equal to . You can pass -1 to load from to the last page in the file.
member.value: An integer value that specifies the last page to load.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.ConvertRequest
member.summary: The ConvertRequest object provides options for the IRasterService.Convert operation.

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub RasterConvertOptionsExample() Dim client As RasterServiceClient = New RasterServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "image1.cmp")
Dim convertOptions As RasterConvertOptions = New RasterConvertOptions()
convertOptions.Source = sourceBinaryData convertOptions.Destination = Nothing convertOptions.Format = RasterImageFormat.RasPdf convertOptions.FirstPage = 1 convertOptions.LastPage = 1 convertOptions.BitsPerPixel = 24 convertOptions.QualityFactor = 2 convertOptions.BackColor = "Black" convertOptions.Height = 200 convertOptions.Width = 200 convertOptions.ResizeFlags = RasterResizeFlags.Bicubic convertOptions.ResizeMode = RasterResizeMode.Fit convertOptions.HorizontalAlignMode = RasterAlignMode.Center convertOptions.VerticalAlignMode = RasterAlignMode.Center
Dim request As ConvertRequest = New ConvertRequest()
request.ConvertOptions = convertOptions
Dim response As ConvertResponse = client.Convert(request) If Not response.Destination Is Nothing Then If TypeOf response.Destination Is RawBinaryData Then File.WriteAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "converted_resized.pdf", (TryCast(response.Destination, RawBinaryData)).Data) End If End If
client.Close() End Sub

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.GetInformationRequest
member.summary: The GetInformationRequest object provides options for the IRasterService.GetInformation operation.

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub GetInformationExample() Dim client As IRasterService = New RasterServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(Path.Combine(LEAD_VARS.ImagesDir, "image1.cmp"))
Dim informationRequest As GetInformationRequest = New GetInformationRequest()
informationRequest.Source = sourceBinaryData informationRequest.PageNumber = 1 informationRequest.TotalPages = False
Dim response As GetInformationResponse = client.GetInformation(informationRequest) If Not response Is Nothing Then Console.WriteLine(String.Format("BytesPerLine: {0}", response.BytesPerLine)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("ColorSpace: {0}", response.ColorSpace.ToString())) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Compresion: {0}", response.Compression)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Format: {0}", response.Format)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("HasAlpha: {0}", response.HasAlpha)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("HasResolution: {0}", response.HasResolution)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Height: {0}", response.Height)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("IsRotated: {0}", response.IsRotated)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("IsSigned: {0}", response.IsSigned)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Order: {0}", response.Order)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("PageNumber: {0}", response.PageNumber)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("SizeDisk: {0}", response.SizeDisk)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("SizeMemory: {0}", response.SizeMemory)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("TotalPages: {0}", response.TotalPages)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("ViewPerspective: {0}", response.ViewPerspective)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Width: {0}", response.Width)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("XResolution: {0}", response.XResolution)) Console.WriteLine(String.Format("YResolution: {0}", response.YResolution)) End If End Sub
Public NotInheritable Class LEAD_VARS Public Const ImagesDir As String = "C:\Users\Public\Documents\LEADTOOLS Images" End Class

member.summary: Removes the region from the image and frees the memory used for the region.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.EllipseRasterRegionData
member.summary: Creates or updates the image region by adding an elliptical region.

remarks.para: To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the property. For more information, refer to .

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.faultcontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.imageprocessing.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub EllipseRasterRegionDataExample() Dim client As EffectsProcessingServiceClient = New EffectsProcessingServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "image1.cmp")
Dim convertOptions As RasterConvertOptions = New RasterConvertOptions()
convertOptions.Source = sourceBinaryData convertOptions.Destination = Nothing convertOptions.Format = RasterImageFormat.Bmp convertOptions.FirstPage = 1 convertOptions.LastPage = 1 convertOptions.BitsPerPixel = 24 convertOptions.QualityFactor = 2
Dim region As EllipseRasterRegionData = New EllipseRasterRegionData() region.CombineMode = RasterRegionCombineMode.Set
Dim rect As LeadRectangle = New LeadRectangle() rect.Width = 200 rect.Height = 200
region.Bounds = rect
Dim request As SharpenRequest = New SharpenRequest()
request.ConvertOptions = convertOptions request.RegionData = region request.Sharpness = 1000
Dim response As CommandResponse = client.Sharpen(request) If Not response.Destination Is Nothing Then If TypeOf response.Destination Is RawBinaryData Then File.WriteAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "EllipseRasterRegionData.bmp", (TryCast(response.Destination, RawBinaryData)).Data) End If End If
client.Close() End Sub

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RectangleRasterRegionData
member.summary: Creates or updates the image region by adding a rectangular region.

remarks.para: To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the property. For more information, refer to .

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.faultcontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.imageprocessing.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub RectangleRasterRegionDataExample() Dim client As EffectsProcessingServiceClient = New EffectsProcessingServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "image1.cmp")
Dim convertOptions As RasterConvertOptions = New RasterConvertOptions()
convertOptions.Source = sourceBinaryData convertOptions.Destination = Nothing convertOptions.Format = RasterImageFormat.Bmp convertOptions.FirstPage = 1 convertOptions.LastPage = 1 convertOptions.BitsPerPixel = 24 convertOptions.QualityFactor = 2
Dim region As RectangleRasterRegionData = New RectangleRasterRegionData() region.CombineMode = RasterRegionCombineMode.Set
Dim rect As LeadRectangle = New LeadRectangle() rect.Width = 200 rect.Height = 200
region.Bounds = rect
Dim request As SharpenRequest = New SharpenRequest()
request.ConvertOptions = convertOptions request.RegionData = region request.Sharpness = 1000
Dim response As CommandResponse = client.Sharpen(request) If Not response.Destination Is Nothing Then If TypeOf response.Destination Is RawBinaryData Then File.WriteAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "RectangleRasterRegionData.bmp", (TryCast(response.Destination, RawBinaryData)).Data) End If End If
client.Close() End Sub

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from a .
member.param: A that represents the bounding rectangle that defines the ellipse.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode
member.summary: Controls the creation of an image region.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode.And
member.summary:
(0x00000000)
The resulting region includes only the intersection of the existing region and the new one. The following example shows the result, where the rectangles represent the existing region, the ellipse represents the new one, and the shaded area represents the resulting region.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode.Set
member.summary:
(0x00000001)
The resulting region includes only the new region. The existing region, if any, is discarded. The following example shows the result, where the ellipse is the new region and the shaded area is the resulting region.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode.AndNotImage
member.summary:
(0x00000002)
The resulting region includes the intersection of the area outside the existing region and the area inside the new region. The following example shows the result, where the rectangle is the existing region, the ellipse is the new one, and the shaded area is the resulting region.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode.AndNotRegion
member.summary:
(0x00000003)
The resulting region includes the intersection of the area inside the existing region and the area outside the new region. The following example shows the result, where the rectangle is the existing region, the ellipse is the new one, and the shaded area is the resulting region.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode.Or
member.summary:
(0x00000004)
The resulting region includes the area inside the existing region and the area inside the new region. The following example shows the result, where the rectangle is the existing region, the ellipse is the new one, and the shaded area is the resulting region.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode.Xor
member.summary:
(0x00000005)
The resulting region includes the area inside the existing region and the area inside the new region, except for any areas where the two intersect. The following example shows the result, where the rectangle is the existing region, the ellipse is the new one, and the shaded area is the resulting region.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterRegionCombineMode.SetNot
member.summary:
(0x00000006)
The resulting region includes everything in the image, except the new region. The existing region, if any, is discarded. The following example shows the result, where the ellipse is the new region and the shaded area is the resulting region.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.CodecsColorSpaceType
member.summary: Indicates the colorspace for the image data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.ExifJpeg
member.summary: (0x00000062)Exif (JPEG 4-2-2). This is the same as RasterImageFormat.ExifJpeg422.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.Raw
member.summary: (0x00000099)Raw Image Data. LEADTOOLS can load and save raw compressed or uncompressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.RawRgb
member.summary: (0x0000009C)Raw Image Data. LEADTOOLS can load and save raw compressed or uncompressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.RawRle4
member.summary: (0x0000009D)Raw Image Data (RLE 4-bit). LEADTOOLS can load and save raw compressed or uncompressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.RawRle8
member.summary: (0x0000009E)Raw Image Data (RLE 8-bit).LEADTOOLS can load and save raw compressed or uncompressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.RawBitfields
member.summary: (0x0000009F)Raw Image Data (BitField compressed). LEADTOOLS can load and save raw compressed or uncompressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.RawPackBits
member.summary: (0x000000A0)Raw Image Data (Packbits compressed). LEADTOOLS can load and save raw compressed or uncompressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.RawCcitt
member.summary: (0x000000A2)Raw Image Data (CCITT compressed). LEADTOOLS can load and save raw compressed or uncompressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.RawLzw
member.summary: (0x000000B2)LZW Image Data. LEADTOOLS can save raw lzw compressed data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.PdfLeadMrc
member.summary: (0x0000013D)PDF format with image segmentation using MRC.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.Txt
member.summary: (0x0000013C)ASCII Text Format. LEADTOOLS can load TXT files as raster images.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterImageFormat.Hdp

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective
member.summary: Indicates the view perspective of the image data.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft
member.summary: (0x00000001)Top-left of image is first in memory.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft
member.summary: (0x00000004)Bottom-left of image is first in memory.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.TopRight
member.summary: (0x00000002)(Document/Medical only) First row is the right side, first column is top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft180
member.summary: (0x00000002)(Document/Medical only) Same as TopLeft, which is BottomLeft rotated clockwise by 180 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.BottomRight
member.summary: (0x00000003)(Document/Medical only) First row is the right side, first column is the bottom side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft180
member.summary: (0x00000003)(Document/Medical only) Same as BottomRight, which is TopLeft rotated clockwise by 180 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.RightTop
member.summary: (0x00000006)(Document/Medical only) First row is the right side, first column is top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft90
member.summary: (0x00000006)(Document/Medical only) Same as RightTop, which is TopLeft rotated clockwise by 90 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.LeftBottom
member.summary: (0x00000008)(Document/Medical only) First row is the left side, first column is top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.TopLeft270
member.summary: (0x00000008)(Document/Medical only) Same as LeftBottom, which is TopLeft rotated clockwise by 270 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.LeftTop
member.summary: (0x00000005)(Document/Medical only) First row is the left side, first column is the top side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft90
member.summary: (0x00000005)(Document/Medical only) Same as LeftTop, which is BottomLeft rotated clockwise by 90 degrees.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.RightBottom
member.summary: (0x00000007)(Document/Medical only) First row is the right side, first column is the bottom side.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterViewPerspective.BottomLeft270
member.summary: (0x00000007)(Document/Medical only) Same as RightBottom, which is BottomLeft rotated clockwise by 270 degrees.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterByteOrder
member.summary: Indicates the color byte order of the image data.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeFlags
member.summary: Controls the behavior of image resize methods.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeFlags.FavorBlack
member.summary:
(0x00000001)
(Document/Medical only) Preserve black objects when making the image smaller. This option affects only 1-bit, black-and-white images, where it prevents the disappearance of thin lines. You can use a bitwise OR ( | ) to combine this flag with another one. For example, Resample | FavorBlack causes color images to be resampled, but applies the favor-black option to 1-bit, black-and-white images.
If you apply this flag to an image that has more than 1 bit per pixel, then the behavior is undefined.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeFlags.Resample
member.summary: (0x00000002)Use linear interpolation and averaging to produce a higher-quality image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeFlags.Bicubic
member.summary: (0x00000004)Use bicubic interpolation and averaging to produce a higher quality image. This is slower than Resample.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeMode
member.summary: Determines how to fit the image in the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeMode.Fit
member.summary: (0x00000001)Fit the image into the destination rectangle while maintaining the aspect ratio. If the image size is smaller than the destination rectangle, no resizing is done.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeMode.FitAlways
member.summary: (0x00000002)Always fit the image into the destination rectangle while maintaining the aspect ratio even if the image size is smaller than the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeMode.FitWidth
member.summary: (0x00000003)Fit the image width to be the size of the width of the destination rectangle while maintaining the aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterResizeMode.Stretch
member.summary: (0x00000004)Fit the image to fill the destination rectangle. Aspect ratio might not be maintained.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterAlignMode
member.summary: Determines how to align the image in the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterAlignMode.Near
member.summary: (0x00000000)Align the image to the left (if this is the horizontal alignment) or top (if this is the vertical alignment) of the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterAlignMode.Center
member.summary: (0x00000001)Center the image in the middle of the destination rectangle. If the image size is greater than the destination rectangle size then do not center the image.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterAlignMode.CenterAlways
member.summary: (0x00000002)Center the image in the middle of the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.RasterAlignMode.Far
member.summary: (0x00000003)Align the image to the right (if this is the horizontal alignment) or bottom (if this is the vertical alignment) of the destination rectangle.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.MagicWandRasterRegionData
member.summary: Creates or updates the image region based on the color found at a specified point.

remarks.para: The minimum channel tolerance value of lowerToleranceColor will be used to set the lower stopping point, and the value of upperToleranceColor will be used to set the upper stopping point. For example, if the value of the pixel at (x, y) is (125, 125, 125) and lowerToleranceColor is (20,30,15), the smallest value of the triplet (15) will be used to create the lower stopping point of (110,110,110). If upperToleranceColor is (10,25,20), the smallest value of that triplet (10) will be used to create the upper stopping point of (135,135,135).
To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the parameter. For more information, refer to .

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.faultcontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.imageprocessing.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub MagicWandRasterRegionDataExample() Dim client As EffectsProcessingServiceClient = New EffectsProcessingServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "image1.cmp")
Dim convertOptions As RasterConvertOptions = New RasterConvertOptions()
convertOptions.Source = sourceBinaryData convertOptions.Destination = Nothing convertOptions.Format = RasterImageFormat.Bmp convertOptions.FirstPage = 1 convertOptions.LastPage = 1 convertOptions.BitsPerPixel = 24 convertOptions.QualityFactor = 2
Dim region As MagicWandRasterRegionData = New MagicWandRasterRegionData() region.CombineMode = RasterRegionCombineMode.Set
' Specify a pixel in the upper left of the displayed image Dim pt As LeadPoint = New LeadPoint() pt.X = 100 pt.Y = 100
region.Location = pt
' Create a magic wand region at this point region.LowerToleranceColor = "#00141E96" region.UpperToleranceColor = "#000F1E0A"
Dim request As SharpenRequest = New SharpenRequest()
request.ConvertOptions = convertOptions request.RegionData = region request.Sharpness = 1000
Dim response As CommandResponse = client.Sharpen(request) If Not response.Destination Is Nothing Then File.WriteAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "MagicWandRasterRegionData.bmp", (TryCast(response.Destination, RawBinaryData)).Data) End If
client.Close() End Sub

member.name: M:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.MagicWandRasterRegionData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.MagicWandRasterRegionData.#ctor(Leadtools.LeadPoint,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets a region based on the color found at a location in the image.
member.param: A point in an image with the color will be used to set the region.
Lower tolerance values that set the lower stopping point for the region.
Upper tolerance values that set the upper stopping point for the region.

remarks.para: The minimum channel tolerance value of will be used to set the lower stopping point, and the value of will be used to set the upper stopping point. For example, if the value of the pixel at (x, y) is (125, 125, 125) and is (20,30,15), the smallest value of the triplet (15) will be used to create the lower stopping point of (110,110,110). If is (10,25,20), the smallest value of that triplet (10) will be used to create the upper stopping point of (135,135,135).
To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the parameter. For more information, refer to .

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.MagicWandRasterRegionData.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets a point with the color that will be used to set the region.
member.value: A with the color that will be used to set the region.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.MagicWandRasterRegionData.LowerToleranceColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the lower tolerance color values that set the lower stopping point for the region.

remarks.para: To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the property. For more information, refer to .

member.value: A string value that represents the lower tolerance color values.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.MagicWandRasterRegionData.UpperToleranceColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the upper tolerance color values that set the upper stopping point for the region.

remarks.para: To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the property. For more information, refer to .

member.value: A string value that represents the upper tolerance color values.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.PolygonRasterRegionData
member.summary: Creates or updates the image region by adding a polygonal region.

remarks.para: To update an existing region, specify how the new region is to be combined with the existing one using the property. For more information, refer to .

example.code:
Imports Leadtools.Services Imports leadtools.services.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.datacontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.raster.faultcontracts._2009._01 Imports leadtools.services.imageprocessing.datacontracts._2009._01
Public Sub PolygonRasterRegionDataExample() Dim client As EffectsProcessingServiceClient = New EffectsProcessingServiceClient() Dim sourceBinaryData As RawBinaryData = New RawBinaryData() sourceBinaryData.Data = File.ReadAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "image1.cmp")
Dim convertOptions As RasterConvertOptions = New RasterConvertOptions()
convertOptions.Source = sourceBinaryData convertOptions.Destination = Nothing convertOptions.Format = RasterImageFormat.Bmp convertOptions.FirstPage = 1 convertOptions.LastPage = 1 convertOptions.BitsPerPixel = 24 convertOptions.QualityFactor = 2
Dim point1 As LeadPoint = New LeadPoint() point1.X = 1 point1.Y = 50
Dim point2 As LeadPoint = New LeadPoint() point2.X = 10 point2.Y = 80
Dim point3 As LeadPoint = New LeadPoint() point2.X = 50 point2.Y = 50
Dim region As PolygonRasterRegionData = New PolygonRasterRegionData() region.Points = New LeadPoint(2) {} region.Points(0) = point1 region.Points(1) = point2 region.Points(2) = point3 region.CombineMode = RasterRegionCombineMode.Set
Dim request As SharpenRequest = New SharpenRequest()
request.ConvertOptions = convertOptions request.RegionData = region request.Sharpness = 1000
Dim response As CommandResponse = client.Sharpen(request) If Not response.Destination Is Nothing Then If TypeOf response.Destination Is RawBinaryData Then File.WriteAllBytes(LeadtoolsExamples.Common.ImagesPath.Path & "PolygonRasterRegionData.bmp", (TryCast(response.Destination, RawBinaryData)).Data) End If End If
client.Close() End Sub

member.name: M:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.PolygonRasterRegionData.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.PolygonRasterRegionData.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.List{Leadtools.LeadPoint},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: A list of objects. The points in the list must be in the order in which the vertices of the polygon are connected. To create the line that closes the polygon, the last point in the collection is connected to the first point of the collection.

param.name: windingFillMode
param.para: Indicates how to handle complex crossing lines.

tr.td: All pixels that are inside the resulting exterior lines are in the region.
The region includes the area between odd-numbered and even-numbered polygon sides on each scan line.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.PolygonRasterRegionData.WindingFillMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating how to handle complex crossing lines.

tr.td: All pixels that are inside the resulting exterior lines are in the region.
The region includes the area between odd-numbered and even-numbered polygon sides on each scan line.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Services.Raster.DataContracts.PolygonRasterRegionData.Points
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of objects.
member.remarks: The points in the list must be in the order in which the vertices of the polygon are connected. To create the line that closes the polygon, the last point in the collection is connected to the first point of the collection.
member.value: A list of object that represents a polygon.
